Groups.Group: Red Hat Software Collections 1 for RHEL 6
Red Hat Software Collections 1 for RHEL 7

Arg.V:
#!/bin/bash
function updatepk() { if [ ! -z $1 ]; then if [ -e /var/run/yum.pid ];then exit 10 fi result=`yum -y update $1 2>&1` status=$? commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: command not found"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: No such file or directory"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "lock /var/run/yum.pid"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "/var/run/yum.pid: another copy is running"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "There was an error communicating with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "This system is not registered with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "No Repositories Available to Set Up"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "Error Class Code: 9 Error Class Info: Invalid System Credentials"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isscriptletfailed=`echo $result | grep -E "error:" | grep -E "scriptlet failed, exit status 255"` if [ "$isscriptletfailed" != "" ]; then exit 6 fi if [ $status -ne 0 ];then exit 7 fi fi } updatepk ror40-rubygem-jquery-rails
exit 0

Vulnerability.Title: ror40 bug fix and enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description:
Updated ror40 packages that fix several bugs and add various enhancements are now available as part of Red Hat Software Collections 1.2 for Red Hat Enterprise Linux. Ruby on Rails is a model–view–controller (MVC) framework for web application development. Action Pack implements the controller and the view components. Active Record implements object-relational mapping for accessing database entries using objects. Active Support provides support and utility classes used by the Ruby on Rails framework.
The ror40 packages have been upgraded to a later version that is required by Red Hat Software Collections 1.2. The ror40 packages include Ruby on Rails 4.0, a web application development framework written in the Ruby language. This Software Collection is supported together with the ruby200 collection.
The ror40-rubygem-jquery-rails package has been upgraded to upstream version 3.1.0, which provides a number of bug fixes and enhancements over the previous version. (BZ#1086262)
In addition, this update adds the following enhancement:
* To make the ror40-rubygem-bundler behavior consistent with ruby193-rubygem-bundler, the "--local" option is now used by default to prefer locally installed gems over the gems from remote repositories. (BZ#1115079)
Users of ror40 are advised to upgrade to these updated packages, which fix these bugs and add these enhancements.
Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
